mapper.update: update sphinxex.answer_questions set evaluation = #{evaluation} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select aq.id as id, aq.point as point, aq.answer as answer, aq.evaluation as evaluation, aq.answer_topic_id as answer_topic_id, aq.level as level, aq.subject as subject, aq.links as links, aq.evaluation as evaluation from sphinxex.answer_questions aq left join sphinxex.answer_topics at on aq.answer_topic_id = at.id left join sphinxex.questionnaires q on at.questionnaire_id = q.id where q.id = #{questionnaireId} and aq.evaluation = 1

select aq.id as id, aq.point as point, aq.answer as answer, aq.evaluation as evaluation, aq.answer_topic_id as answer_topic_id, aq.level as level, aq.subject as subject, aq.links as links, aq.evaluation as evaluation from sphinxex.answer_questions aq where aq.id = #{id}
